name: DALAT CANYONING TOURS
description:
It’s traveling in canyons using a variety of techniques that includes other outdoor activities such as trekking through down river, crazy jumping, swimming, sliding and abseiling (rappelling).
Look crazy!!! Who and what’s age can do?
Which more than 10 canyoing experts will train you how to set the rope for descent and how to abseil safety in an easy way, we would like to say : Welcome everybody! You’re strong or weak, young or old, brave or coward, lad or lass.
we guarantee your safety:” get on board-get back shore” welcome to my boat my friends.
